data: [IMPROVEMENTS]
Added intro skipping back
Added rolling ball powerup bouncing SFX back
Old physics now works (i just forgot to add the file with data, whoops)
Fixed issue that make it impossible to load round when you have same items equipped in locker
Fixed issue with time-attack checkpoint time (sucks solution, anyways)
[IMPROVEMENTS]
Explore rounds now fetching directly though Fall Guys API, this makes the whole download progress way faster (was FGAnalyst previously, sorry PTJ)
Transferred almost all logic to locally hosted server (multiplayer coming soon!!)
Various gameplay improvements
Added some missing SFX back
Slightly improved game boot time (FGTools no longer checks build scenes every time you open the game)
Creative rounds now taking less time to load
Better look for theme preview
Returning to Default theme no longer require game restart
Added notification when cosmetic preset was automatically set
Replaced spawnpoint with actual checkpoint model from editor
Now when you hovering on a tab you will see it's full name (since most of names were not fitting in)
Cosmetics search panel now always displays on the top left corner of the screen, main FGTools panel will be always hidden in locker
Improved free fly mode
Fixed all known bugs (or not all, who knows)
Minor changes/updates
Added new bugs
Something else, maybe, I started making this update while ago, I definitely forgot about something
[KNOWN ISSUES]
Score zones in creative not awarding points
Search for nicknames works only as list (temporary solution)
Explore skip round button may disappear sometimes
Resetting random cosmetics in-game doesn't work
Favoriting of cosmetics you not owning doesn't work
Some config options not changing anything (i'll rework whole config system soon)
Slight performance issues / rare crashes
[REMOVALS]
Removed custom fonts (they genuinely looked ugly, sorry to all their fans)
Removed OnlyQualScreen, OnlyElimScreen, OnlyWinScreen options from config
Removed bubbles from time attack (will add them back later)
Removed fix of Frantic Factory (will be added back later)
Removed explore results screen (will be added back later)
Removed Herobrine
[IMPROVEMENTS]
Changed the way FGTools content works
Round loading in additive mode now again works in creative
Improved UI code
Improved config descriptions
Improved round searching
Improved content downloading, now you can't softlock if something goes wrong
Tip toe tiles are now spawning in the tip top finale
Fixed time attack (with bubbles)
Localization was moved from .csv to .json
Minor changes & improvements
[KNOWN ISSUES]
Some audio takes a lot of time to load OR not loading at all (waiting for fix by mediatonic)
[REMOVALS]
Removed localization support for config descriptions
Removed Herobrine
[LOCALLY SAVED CREATIVE LEVELS]
Now when your level is autosaving it's local copy being created (can be disabled in config)
You can always return to this copy and overwrite your level with it
You can also create level copy via UI
[IMPROVEMENTS]
Fixed all issues after 11.5 update
Cosmetics search now supports search by id
Cosmetics search now can print result as text
Autosaves feature was a little bit improved
After level was autosaved you will see save result if GUI is enabled
Round loader no longer allows you load maps while you in editor (if you're loading them in single mode)
Round loader no longer allows you load maps that was removed as it causes softlock
Now you can hide free camera UI
Minor fixes
Localization improvements
[ISSUES]
Powerup SFX is missing
Some audio takes a lot of time to load (waiting for fix by mediatonic)
[REMOVALS]
Removed Herobrine
[IMPROVEMENTS]
Fixed all issues after 11.4 update
Completely re-writed cosmetics presets feature (old presets no longer supported (sorry))
Added config option to automatically use your latest preset
"Add All Cosmetics" now supports emoticons and phrases
Fixed stages work in Show Loader
Re-enabled "Speedrun Mode" when you are playing a show
A few small tweaks and bug fixes
[REMOVALS]
Removed Herobrine
[NEW CONTENT]
Creative round loader and playable Explore show (via FGAnalyst API)
FGTools Statistics (amount of time in game with FGTools, round history, etc)
Main Menu theme selector with an online catalogue of available ones
Cool FGTools gaming intro at the first game's launch
Cosmetics Search
[IMPROVEMENTS]
You can now change the language of FGTools GUI without restarting the game
Localization now updates everytime you launch the game (NOTE FOR TRANSLATORS: enable 'use backup localization' in config when translating)
Japanese translation by Nemui_gamer
Spanish translation by ItzAqua!
The 'Add All Cosmetics' option now doesn't require game relaunch
Now you can favorite cosmetics that you don't have
Improved sorting in locker
Improved round loading time
Round Load Rules (an easier way to edit round rules like time limit)
Reworked Debug GUI
Added an option to make detailed bug reports with GUI (please use this, guys, I beg you)
Fixed audio not moving with Free Camera
FGTools GUIs now all use a custom font (you can disable it in config)
Show Loader now displays show's icon
Show Loader now supports stages (like in the actual game)
Fixed Rhino's animations
Leading Light and Frantic Factory were fixed
Random Rounds were removed, but instead of them you can play Explore - Unity
Speedrun Mode now displays the difference between your previous run and your current run
Fixed missing Speed Boost VFX
Respawn Position now calculates almost the same way as the real game
Fixed Fall Guy's X-RAY
Improvements of TIP's pop-ups
Custom newsfeeds
Old code rewrite
Other bug fixes & improvements as always
[REMOVALS]
Removed the ability to cancel round loading (you can still leave to Main Menu while round's intro is active)
Removed the custom background feature (was replaced by Menu Themes)
Removed custom HEX colors for objects in creative as it was fixed by mediatonic
Temporarily removed Offline Mode
Removed Herobrine
Fixed all issues after 11.1.0 update
Added autosaves to creative (can be disabled in config)
Added ability to set custom color for objects in creative
Added ability to respawn at checkpoint position instead of spawn position in speedrun mode (needs to be enabled in config)
Added ability to disable round checkpoints (speedrun mode only)
Fixed platforms movement in Space Race
Fixed not working point system in Pegwin Pool Party
Powerups now can be changed without round reload
Improved GUI
Improved Online check
Small improvements & one more thing
Removed Herobrine
Fixed all issues after 11.0.1 update
Reworked how levels are loading
Updated Korean localization by ArenaCloser12
Improved Discord RPC
Your username is now displays on winner screen (previously ... displayed instead of your username)
Removed Herobrine
FGTools now have custom Discord RPC (Discord Playing status) (it also support creative)
Added variation controller, you can enable any variation you want, and save it (from kota's lithium)
Now it's impossible to get deleted rounds in load random round button
Now deleted rounds have special identification in round list
Time format for speedrun mode was changed from XX:XX.XX to XX:XX.XXX
Fixed issue that make Time Attack bubble impossible to collect on EGS version
Fixed issues that make some rounds impossible to load
Fixed issues with free camera
Updated IMG2FGC to latest version
Updated CN localization by XiaoBai
Fixed all issues after Fall Forever update
Now you can set custom hotkey for debug info
Now you can select custom username in offline mode (instead of OfflineGuy)
Added ability to enable old character physics (old physics in config)
Added custom tooltips on round loading screen
Removed funny thing... (thanks mediatonic!!!)
Removed LOOKS LIKE YOU'RE ONLINE/OFFLINE popups
Reverted all changes to time limit due to random bugs for some people
Minor fixes & improvements
Time Attack game mode was fixed
Level badges (aka medals) now showing when you qualifying
Fall Feed was fixed
Added a tips when you entering free camera and free fly mode for the first time
Added ability to disable randomized variations (like in 1.3.0)
Added Fast load setting for loading screen (this will make loading screen take minimal time)
Added ability to enable random music in levels
Pressing Continue in Speedrun continue pop-up will make you respawn instead of whole scene reload (you can enable old variant if needed)
Now when timer ends you will see qualify or eliminated screen too (previously only time's up screen)
Speedrun restart button now follow's game's time attack restart button (which means you can now use joysticks for it)
Fixed issue that make sweet thieves unavailable in round loader
Fixed Refresh All GUI Info button
Fixed bug which make victory screen music won't end
Real Tip Toe tiles won't shake any more
If timer disabled you won't see it in countdown on Time Attack
Small fixes and improvements
Debug UI now more useful (for me)
Added version check (on outdated versions a message will appear after countdown end)
Added changelog popup
Added few secrets :)

country_codes.country: Church Slavic; Old Slavonic; Church Slavonic; Old Bulgarian; Old Church Slavonic

content.subject: Kota
content.perfom: Help with code, some CEP code

content.subject: RRM1
content.perfom: Help with code, some fallguyloadr code

user_shows_data.show_desc: Play these amazing rounds completely... ALONE
